segments.text: Have you ever shopped at Whole Foods market ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's very good , and it's fresh too .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I do my shopping at Sons .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I shopped there before too , but the food is better at Whole Foods .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Their range of organic foods is very limited .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Whole Foods has a lot of organic foods ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah , the food there is very healthy .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I've never been , but I may start shopping there .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The food there is a great step up from Sons .
segments.speaker: S1
